attributes.action: To lengthen the period of staying in your caravan all year round in caravan park
attributes.background: I think it should be lengthened as when you live in a caravan it’s your home. Having to leave your home for 2 months with no choice is not fair. Trying to find the money to stay some where for 2 months causes a lot of money problems and this situation could be avoided With help.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept petitions about matters which are not the responsibility of Government or Parliament. This issue is the responsibility of local planning authorities (usually local councils).

You can find you local council here:

https://www.gov.uk/find-local-council
